nodes.text: The mining safety committee was an organization that was responsible for a shortage of Nolarian 6000 drills in 39 BBY. On the planet of Nolar, Quermian Dr. Murk Lundi was unable to purchase one of these drills from a machinery dealer, who said that the shortage would last for some time due to the committee's close oversight.
The mining safety committee was first mentioned in the 2002 young readers novel Jedi Apprentice Special Edition: The Followers, written by Jude Watson.
